name: Citizen
desc: An ordinary commoner.

name: Spear Fighter
desc:
Average soldiers possessing
no special abilities.

name: Gunman
desc: A modern fighter who uses all types of firearms. Also capable of using knives.

name: Spellblade
desc: Swordfighters with superior speed and skill.

name: Skirmisher
desc:
Ruffians with great strength but
poor defense.

name: Machinist
desc: Backline fighters who are competent with mechanical weapons.

name: Myrmidon
desc: Fast but frail swordfighters.

name: Swordmaster
desc: Master swordfighters who strike with blinding speed.

name: Mercenary
desc: Veteran swordfighters with low speed but otherwise balanced stats.

name: Hero
desc: Veteran mercenaries with all around good stats.

name: Soldier
desc: Spearmen with all around balanced stats.

name: Armor
desc: Heavily armored knights with exceptional defense.

name: General
desc: Hulking knights with near impenetrable defenses.

name: Fighter
desc: Axe fighters with exceptional strength and poor speed.

name: Warrior
desc: Seasoned fighters with unstoppable strength.

name: Brigand
desc: Unarmored fighters who are faster than they look.

name: Berserker
desc: Masters of the axe with a terrifying combination of strength and speed.

name: Thief
desc: Expert in stealth and subterfuge. Possess weak attacks but many other skills.

name: Rogue
desc: Veteran thieves that can strike weaknesses at a moment's notice.

name: Archer
desc: Lightly armored bowmen with high skill.

name: Sniper
desc: Master bowmen who can hit their target from hundreds of feet away.

name: Cavalier
desc: Mounted knights with balanced stats.

name: Paladin
desc: Distinguished cavaliers who are masters of the battlefield.

name: Peg. Knight
desc: Flying knights with high speed and poor defense.

name: Falcoknight
desc: Graceful pegasus knights who make battle look like a dance.

name: Eagle Knight
desc: Flying knights with balanced stats.

name: Griffin Knight
desc: Honorable eagle knights who have fought in countless battles.

name: Wyvern Knight.
desc: Flying knights with great strength but poor speed.

name: Wyvern Lord
desc: Ferocious wyvern knights that strike fear in their enemies hearts.

name: Mage
desc: Balanced mages who can use a wide variety of elemental skills.

name: Sage
desc: Advanced mages that strike weaknesses with precision.

name: Shaman
desc: Impulsive mages who can utilize rare skills.

name: Druid
desc: Magic masters who have know of the most arcane skills.

name: Curate
desc: Clergymen who utilize healing and light skills.

name: Bishop
desc: Esteemed clergymen who can aid their allies and smite their enemies.

name: Spirit
desc: Elemental shadows with incredible magic power.

name: Troubadour
desc: Mounted healers who can defend themselves with swords.

name: Valkyrie
desc: Well-travelled troubadours who can heal and hurt equally.

name: Great Knight
desc: Veteran horse knights.

name: Ranger
desc: Devotees of the bow. Possess incredible range.
